title: Weather Derivative Analysis for Hedging
description: A hydro-plant operator wants to use a weather derivative (e.g., a rainfall swap) to hedge against the risk of a low-rainfall year.

tasks.description: Analyze the historical correlation between rainfall levels in the dam's catchment area and the plant's annual revenue.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms a strong positive correlation.

tasks.description: Evaluate quotes for a rainfall derivative that pays out if rainfall is below a certain threshold.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent retrieves quotes and terms for a suitable derivative product.

tasks.description: Model the combined financial outcome of the hydro plant and the derivative under different rainfall scenarios (drought, normal, wet).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent shows how the derivative smooths revenue by paying out in the drought scenario.
